column2: Lockheed's F-35 fighter to start testing on USS Nimitz carrier WASHINGTON
column3: Nov 2 Lockheed Martin Corp's  F-35 fighter jet is slated to begin two weeks of developmental testing on board the USS Nimitz aircraft carrier
column4: marking another key milestone for the Pentagon's biggest weapons program.

column2: Blaze from firework display closes ride at Florida Disney park Nov 2 A fire caused by debris from a firework display at the Walt Disney World Magic Kingdom in Florida forced a ride to close for about an hour on Saturday
column4: a spokeswoman for the park said.

column2: Dish far apart on contract as deadline nears-source LOS ANGELES/NEW YORK
column4: CBS Corp  and Dish Network Corp are far apart on talks for a new distribution deal
column5: according to a person with knowledge of the negotiations
column6: setting up the possibility that the satellite provider's subscribers could lose access to the most-watched U.S. TV network next month.
